value.title: AWS and NVIDIA launch “Hands-on Machine Learning with Amazon SageMaker and NVIDIA GPUs” on Coursera
value.excerpt: AWS and NVIDIA are excited to announce the new Hands-on Machine Learning with Amazon SageMaker and NVIDIA GPUs course. value.title: Customize Amazon Translate output to meet your domain and organization specific vocabulary
